DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate visual result patient keratoconus treat one two technique : penetrating keratoplasty ( PK ) vs. pachymetry Excimer laser assist lamellar keratoplasty ( PALK ) .
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Keratoconus With PALK Versus PK
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis keratoconus grade III IV Amsler Krumeich classification . Need surgical procedure No endothelial scar Best correct visual acuity < 20/40 Contact lens intolerance Imagenological map pachymetric acquisition 90 % 9 mm corneal diameter Contraindication technique evaluate .
